text: It was a splendid interpretation of the part. The rest of the cast were well chosen, with James Maxwell making a fine job of the sympathetic C O. Paul Daneman gave another first-class performance last night as a wartime naval officer in the B B C's 'The Little Key.'
handwritten_text: It was a splendid interpretation of the part. The rest of the cast were well chosen, with James Maxwell making a fine job of the sympathetic C O. Paul Daneman gave another first-class performance last night as a wartime naval officer in the B B C's 'The Little Key.'
